modName: testing only - Animation patch for JZBai's Throwing Weapons Lite mod
summary: This mod is very crude at the moment. It's meant to be a proof of concept and may be taken down later if the author doesn't like it
descriptionHtml:
This mod is very crude at the moment. I uploaded it for mod testers only. Don't bother downloading it unless that's what you want to do

Update 6pm 19/4/2015: I've been shooting in the dark for months and finally we're getting somewhere. I seem to have succeeded with making a working first person animation file. It's the magic cast idle pose (i.e. weapon drawn, standing there and doing nothing) and I've included in the latest update. Alas tis Sunday evening already. I'll try to make the rest of the necessary 1st person animation files next week or after

Update 10:30pm 20/4/2015: Added the 1st person spell charge animation. The fingers are a little messed up I'll fix it at later stages. The hand moves outside of your field of view when you charge your spell. It's not the best looking for spell casting but for throwing javs it looks quite appropriate.Â 

Update 11pm 28/04/2015: Added 1st person run and walk. Altered the look of 3rd person idle

Extract the folders containing .hkx files to the following location
C:\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data\Meshes\Actors\Character\
author: h1zchan
